body_html:
It did not work -- however, after diving into the code a bit, I realized the issue is in the tf.complex() call, changing the code from

w_ifft = tf.real(tf.batch_ifft2d(tf.complex(w, 0.0)))

to

w_ifft = tf.real(tf.batch_ifft2d(tf.complex(w, w * 0.0)))

Results in a gradient and no error. I'm not sure if this is a bug - but it's logical at least.

body:
It did not work -- however, after diving into the code a bit, I realized the issue is in the tf.complex() call, changing the code from

`w_ifft = tf.real(tf.batch_ifft2d(tf.complex(w, 0.0)))`

to 

`w_ifft = tf.real(tf.batch_ifft2d(tf.complex(w, w * 0.0)))`

Results in a gradient and no error. I'm not sure if this is a bug - but it's logical at least.
